content.query:
SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsestoragee.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT ='csv',
        PARSER_VERSION= '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS[result]


    -- Examine the data types for the columns
    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set 
    N'SELECT 
        TOP 100 * 
    FROM 
        OPENROWSET (
            BULK ''https://synapsestoragee.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
            FORMAT = ''csv'',
            PARSER_VERSION=''2.0'',
            HEADER_ROW = TRUE
        )AS [result]'
